name: abruzzi/bookmarks-frontend
description: A bookmark application, front end part

files.package.json:
{
  "name": "bookmarks-frontend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "A bookmark application, frontend part",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "npm test"
  },
  "browserify": {
    "transform": [
      "hbsfy"
    ]
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/abruzzi/bookmarks-frontend.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "bookmarks",
    "frontend",
    "soc"
  ],
  "author": "Qiu Juntao",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/abruzzi/bookmarks-frontend/issues"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "backbone": "^1.2.1",
    "browserify": "^10.2.4",
    "gulp": "^3.9.0",
    "gulp-concat": "^2.5.2",
    "gulp-connect": "^2.2.0",
    "gulp-less": "^3.0.5",
    "gulp-livereload": "^3.8.1",
    "gulp-minify-css": "^1.1.6",
    "gulp-replace": "^0.5.4",
    "gulp-uglify": "^1.2.0",
    "handlebars": "^3.0.3",
    "hbsfy": "^2.2.1",
    "jquery": "^2.1.4",
    "karma": "^0.12.37",
    "karma-browserify": "^4.4.2",
    "karma-jasmine": "^0.3.6",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^0.2.3",
    "lodash": "^3.9.3",
    "underscore": "^1.8.3",
    "vinyl-source-stream": "^1.1.0",
    "yslow": "^3.1.0"
  }
}
files.Gemfile:
source 'https://ruby.taobao.org'

gem 'sinatra'

group :test do
	gem 'rspec'
    gem 'capybara'
    gem 'poltergeist'
	gem 'site_prism'
end
files.Dockerfile:
FROM python:2.7

RUN mkdir /webapp
COPY ./start.sh /webapp/start.sh
COPY ./public /webapp

ENV PORT 8080

WORKDIR /webapp
CMD /webapp/start.sh
files.docker-compose.yml:
app:
  build: .
  ports:
    - 8080:8080
  volumes:
    - .:/web
  working_dir: /web
  entrypoint: /web/start.sh
